case_title: MUHAMMAD YUSUF vs GOVERNMENT OF BALUCHISTAN AND OTHERS

accussed_details.name: Respondent No. 3
allegation: Improper promotion to Deputy Director, Agriculture (Research)

complaint_summary: The appellant challenged the promotion of Respondent No. 3 to the post of Deputy Director, Agriculture (Research), claiming it was ultra vires and inconsistent with the Agriculture Service (Class I) Rules, 1965.
investigation_summary: The appellant filed a representation against Respondent No. 3's promotion, which was partly accepted, leading to his own promotion as Deputy Director. However, he remained dissatisfied and filed an appeal seeking cancellation of Respondent No. 3's promotion.
judgment_summary: The Tribunal dismissed the appeal, citing lack of jurisdiction under Section 4 of the Baluchistan Service Tribunals Act, 1974, as the matter pertained to fitness for promotion, which is excluded from the Tribunal's scope.
Decision_or_verdict: Appeal dismissed with no order as to costs.
legal_arguments: Section 4 of Baluchistan Service Tribunals Act, 1974 excludes jurisdiction over fitness for promotion.
Proviso (b) of Section 4 bars appeals regarding fitness to hold or be promoted to a post.
Civil Servants Act and Agriculture Service (Class I) Rules, 1965 govern promotion procedures but do not fall under Tribunal jurisdiction.
sections: Section 4 of Baluchistan Service Tribunals Act, 1974
key_issues: Jurisdiction of Tribunal under Section 4 of Baluchistan Service Tribunals Act, 1974
Validity of promotion procedures under Civil Servants Act and Agriculture Service (Class I) Rules, 1965

legal_terms.ultra vires: Beyond the powers or authority of the entity making the decision.
legal_terms.proviso: A clause in a statute that qualifies or restricts its application.

words_and_phrases.fitness for promotion: Assessment of suitability for a higher post.
words_and_phrases.terms and conditions of service: Rules governing employment in a government department.

summary_vector_notes: The case involved a service appeal by Muhammad Yusuf challenging the promotion of Respondent No. 3 to Deputy Director, Agriculture (Research). The Tribunal dismissed the appeal, citing lack of jurisdiction under Section 4 of the Baluchistan Service Tribunals Act, 1974, which excludes appeals related to fitness for promotion.
